title: Marketing Marketing Marketing part 2
body:
Due to the increased discussion in community groups debating the direction Unifi Protocol should go with their marketing strategies it was felt a referendum would help to gather some more information on what the community feels would be some good ways to improve on the marketing.

We'll break this down into 2 sections. The first being about people's views on marketing, as it is now. The second, on what people would like to see from future marketing strategies.

So here goes part 2:

What kind of marketing would you like to see the team utilize most in their future marketing campaign
choices: Community marketing: more direct interaction on telegram, twitter, reddit from marketing team.
Content marketing: more articles, blogs, explainer videos
Infuencer marketing: YouTube videos from known community experts
author: 0xdAaEDA07BB101b98E52BB37e2Edcf25fB8Dc99EC
